message: I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to start with a price of $1200000.
I appreciate your time and consideration, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe it's a fair price for the product, and I'm willing to make a serious offer.

I appreciate your interest in the product, but I'm afraid $900000 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. I can offer it to you for $1100000. This is the best price I can do, and I think it's still a great deal for you.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm willing to offer $950000 for the product. I think it's a fair price considering the value it will bring to me.

I can see you're a serious buyer, and I appreciate that. However, $950000 is still a bit below my target. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I can offer it to you for $1050000. This is my final offer, and I hope you'll consider it.
I understand that you're trying to meet your minimum price, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go up to $980000, but no higher. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.
